name: Blinko
description: Open-source, self-hosted personal AI note tool with RAG search and Markdown-friendly card-based writing.
short_desc: AI-powered card note-taking with RAG search and self-hosting.
author: blinkospace

form_fields.label: NextAuth Secret
form_fields.hint: Generate a strong random string, e.g. `openssl rand -base64 32`.

form_fields.label: Postgres Password
form_fields.hint: Password for the internal postgres user.
